resources.string: A modplayer that plays over 90 mainstream and obscure module formats, including Protracker (MOD), Scream Tracker 3 (S3M), Fast Tracker II (XM) and Impulse Tracker (IT).
The directory where mod files are located
Set the default mixing pan separation

• Storage directory fix for NOOKcolor
• Add option to show replay time
 
Version 1.9.5:
• Add module loop toggle button
• Enable fast scroll in long lists
• Fix IT module fingerprinting
• Fix TP3 module loader
• Fix BoobieSqueezer XM loading
• Fix Archimedes Tracker effects
 
Version 1.9.4:
• Sort directory entries
• Fix FC with modules with more than 30 channels
• Fix temporary directory location
 
Version 1.9.3:
• Faster directory reads
• Fix encoding of URI paths
• Fix filesystem navigation
• Fix prev button in single play mode
 
Version 1.9.2:
• Fix latency compensation
• Fix orientation change handling
• Fix previous button during replay
• Fix FC when adding empty directory to playlist
Set the pan separation for the channel mixer:
Install example music files when creating modules directory
Set the type of volume bars
Play files again after playlist ends
Long press modules to create new playlists or add to existing playlists. Long press playlists for more options.
Based on xmp %s written by Claudio Matsuoka and Hipolito Carraro Jr.

Extended Module Player (C)1996-2010 Claudio Matsuoka and Hipolito Carraro Jr. ulaw encoding function Copyright (C) 1989 Rich Gopstein and Harris Corp. XPK-SQSH decruncher Copyright (C) 1997 Bert Jahn. ProWizard-PC decruncher Copyright (C) 1998 Sylvain Chipaux. IT sample decompression routine Copyright (C) 1998 Tammo Hinrichs. MMCMP and IT lowpass filter routines Copyright (C) 1998 Olivier Lapicque. LZW and Arc depacking Copyright (C) 2001-2006 Russell Marks.
